long_description: Light, stiff and supportive, the Fizik Arione R3 bike saddle offers a podium-pedigree platform for your riding exploits. Synthetic Microtex cover is durable, water resistant and washable, and will not fade; plus, it's lighter weight than leather. Wing Flex design enables outer edges of saddle to flex downward when the inner thigh contacts the saddle, helping increase comfort and pedaling efficiency. Fiberglass/carbon thermoplastic composite shell is optimized for stiffness-to-weight ratio that ensures your saddle supports you, yet doesn't weigh you down. K:ium alloy rails offer an excellent strength-to-weight ratio and comfort-enhancing vibration damping. The Arione R3 saddle is designed to offer support for those with good flexibility-when bent forward fully, one's hands can easily touch toes.
short_description: Light, stiff and supportive, the Fizik Arione R3 bike saddle offers a podium-pedigree platform for your riding exploits.
